content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: TestIAMPermissions path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/stack/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/iam/test content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum test stack policies
reqbody
stacktestiampermissionsrequest
type obj
permissions
type str
desc the set of permissions to test
required true
responses
200
stacktestiampermissionsresponse
type obj
props
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stackpath stack the permissions were tested on
permissions
type str
desc the set of permissions that the calling user does have on the stack
desc a response from a request to test permissions on a stackpath account
title: 28_Stack Policies_TestIAMPermissions_165.json
